citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on April
20, 2022. The inspector called the licensee, and he stated that he was traveling out of the state for the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on April 
20, 2022.  The inspector called the licensee, and he stated that he was traveling out of the state for the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
